metadata.title: Murphy Ben International | Africa's #1 Digital Content Aggregator
metadata.description: The largest YouTube MCN in Africa. Powering Nollywood streaming, Afrobeatz radio, and digital monetization for 500M+ viewers. We are the bridge between African creativity and the global economy.

hero.heading: WE ARE THE BRIDGE.
hero.subheading: Murphy Ben International (MBI) is the digital architecture for African entertainment. We dominate the ecosystem with 10M+ subscribers, 500M+ monthly views, and the world's largest Nollywood catalog.

items.title: Aforevo
items.description: The undisputed giant of Nollywood streaming. Curating, dubbing, and distributing thousands of hours of premium African movies to the diaspora.

items.title: MBI Music
items.description: Amplifying the rhythm of the continent. From Afrobeatz radio to global DSP distribution, we monetize the sound of Africa.

items.title: MBI Tech
items.description: Proprietary DRM and anti-piracy infrastructure protecting the intellectual property of African creators.
